extensionDescription.message: Quickly switch between different Wikipedia language versions.

languageInstruction.message: Enter the WP codes (the part before .wikipedia.org in the URL) for the languages you want to use, separated by commas. For example: en for English, es for Spanish.

customLabelNote.message: You can assign a custom label for each language (e.g., ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸, ä¸­æ–‡, ENG). If left blank, the WP code will be used instead.
